;*****************************************************

	Set Random100 to Random, 101
endif

;start character generation

if  ( CharGenState == 1 )				;the game sets CharGenState to 1 when NEW GAME is selected

	StartScript Startup
	StartScript VampireCheck	
	
	if ( ScriptRunning, CharGen == 0 )
		StartScript CharGen
	endif

endif
